title: Ensure bottom-of-page text remains visible in main content area

requirements.text: Update the selected `<main>` element in `frontend/src/components/layout/AppShell.tsx` (XPath `/html/body/div/div/main`) so that content at the bottom of pages rendered inside `<Outlet />` is not obscured by the fixed mobile bottom navigation and remains readable/visible on small screens.

quotes: In this downside my text should be visible

acceptanceCriteria: On mobile viewport widths (< md), the bottom-most content inside pages rendered via `<Outlet />` is fully visible and can be scrolled above the fixed `MobileBottomNav` without being covered.
No layout regression on desktop (>= md): existing spacing and scroll behavior remains normal.
Change is applied only to the `<main>` element in `AppShell.tsx` (do not modify header, footer, or other layout components for this request).

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected element: `/html/body/div/div/main` (the `<main>` element in `frontend/src/components/layout/AppShell.tsx`).
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths.
nonGoals: Changing footer styling/content or the `MobileBottomNav` component behavior.
Backend changes or data model changes.
